parent_step_sid.description: The SID of the parent step if this step is nested within another step.

name.description: The name or identifier of the step.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the step was last updated.

transitioned_to.description: The state to which the step transitioned.

account_sid.description: The SID of the account associated with the step data.

url.description: The URL for accessing detailed information about the step.

context.description: Additional context or metadata related to the step.

sid.description: The unique identifier (SID) of the step.

transitioned_from.description: The previous state from which the step transitioned.

date_created.description: The date and time when the step was created.

execution_sid.description: The SID of the execution this step belongs to.

flow_sid.description: The SID of the flow to which this step belongs.

links.description: Contains related hypermedia links to navigate through the step data.

step_context.description: Link to additional contextual information related to the step.
